Text:
Hi GOG-Upp could you please upload the latest version of: Leisure Suit Larry Love For Sail (Multi 4)

http://www.gog.com/gamecard/leisure_suit_larry_love_for_sail

Thanks in advance!
You are awesome, thanks so much.
GOG-Upp: very, very big THANKS! Classic games that most people today won't be able to enjoy, I'm affraid, but a great effort on you part anyway ;)
also, OTHER PEOPLE:  those games aren't expensive. Thanks to GOG-Upp you can try them, find what you like, but if you do like - go and buy them. Let's help GOG service stay alive :)
Thanks a lot for these so many uploads!

@pcfan2013, I'll put your request on the list, hopefully it will be uploaded soon!

@everyone, thanks for the support! :)
Hi GOG-Upp thanks for filling my request,but the Language Packs are missing,could you please upload them? specially the Spanish Pack,thanks!
